curPatternObj.1: Ready Posture: Closed Ready Stance C
curPatternObj.2: Step 1. Move the right foot to AC to form a sitting stance toward AD, at the same time executing a middle pushing block to AD with the left palm.
curPatternObj.3: Step 2. Execute a middle punch to AD with the right fist, maintaining a sitting stance toward AD.
curPatternObj.4: Step 3. Move the right foot on line CD, forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
curPatternObj.5: Step 4. Execute a low block to AD with the right outer forearm and a middle side block to D with the left inner forearm, maintaining a right L-stance toward D.
curPatternObj.6: Step 5. Move the left foot to BC forming a sitting stance toward BD, at the same time executing a middle pushing block to BD with the right palm.
curPatternObj.7: Step 6. Execute a middle punch to BD with the right fist, maintaining a sitting stance toward BD.
curPatternObj.8: Step 7. Move the left foot on line CD, forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with the forearm.
curPatternObj.9: Step 8. Execute a low block to BD with the left outer forearm and a middle side block to D with the right inner forearm, maintaining a left L-stance toward D.
curPatternObj.10: Step 9. Turn the face toward C forming a left bending ready stance B toward D.
curPatternObj.11: Step 10. Execute a middle back piercing kick to C with the right foot.
curPatternObj.12: Step 11. Lower the right foot to C, forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle block to D with the left knife hand.
curPatternObj.13: Step 12. Turn the face toward C forming a right bending ready stance B toward D.
curPatternObj.14: Step 13. Execute a middle back piercing kick to C with the left foot.
curPatternObj.15: Step 14. Lower the left foot to C, forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle block to D with the right knife hand.
curPatternObj.16: Step 15. Move the right foot to C, forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a downward thrust to D with the left straight elbow.
curPatternObj.17: Step 16. Move the left foot to C, forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a downward thrust to D with the right straight elbow.
curPatternObj.18: Step 17. Move the left foot to D to form a left walking stance toward D while executing a pressing block to D with the right palm.
curPatternObj.19: Step 18. Move the right foot to D to form a right walking stance toward D while executing a pressing block to D with the left palm.
curPatternObj.20: Step 19. Move the right foot to C forming a right L-stance toward D, while executing a downward block to D with the left outer forearm.
curPatternObj.21: Step 20. Move the right foot to D forming a left L-stance toward D, while executing a downward block to D with the right outer forearm.
curPatternObj.22: Step 21. Move the left foot to D, forming a right rear foot stance toward D, at the same time executing an upward block to D with the left palm.
curPatternObj.23: Step 22. Move the right foot to D, forming a left rear foot stance toward D, at the same time executing an upward block to D with the right palm.
curPatternObj.24: Step 23. Middle side front snap kick to D with the left foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 22. Perform 24 and 25 in a continuous motion.
curPatternObj.25: Step 24. Lower the left foot to D, forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a high inward strike to D with a twin knife-hand.
curPatternObj.26: Step 25. Execute a rising block with the left knife hand, maintaining a left walking stance toward D.
curPatternObj.27: Step 26. Execute a low guarding block to D with a knife hand, while forming a right L-stance toward D, pulling the left foot.
curPatternObj.28: Step 27. Execute a downward punch to D with the right fist while forming a left walking stance toward D, slipping the left foot.
curPatternObj.29: Step 28. Move the left foot to the side rear of the right foot and then slide to C, forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife hand.
curPatternObj.30: Step 29. Jump and land on the same spot, forming a right L-stance toward D while executing a middle guarding block to D with a knife hand.
curPatternObj.31: Step 30. Jump to D to form a right X-stance toward BD, while executing a high side strike to D with the right back fist.
curPatternObj.32: Step 31. Move the left foot to C, forming a left walking stance toward C, at the same time executing a high side block to C with the left outer forearm.
curPatternObj.33: Step 32. Move the left foot on line CD, forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a high side block to D with the right outer forearm.
curPatternObj.34: Step 33. Move the left foot to D, forming a right L-stance toward D, at the same time executing an upset punch to D with the right fist and bringing the left side fist in front of the right shoulder.
curPatternObj.35: Step 34. Execute a middle hook kick to A with the right foot.
curPatternObj.36: Step 35. Lower the right foot to A, forming a left L-stance toward A while executing a high cross cut to A with the right flat finger tip.
curPatternObj.37: Step 36. Bring the right foot to the left foot and then execute a middle hook kick to B with the left foot.
curPatternObj.38: Step 37. Lower the left foot to B, forming a right L-stance toward B, at the same time executing a high cross cut to B with the left flat finger tip.
curPatternObj.39: Step 38. Bring the left foot to the right foot, and then move the right foot to A forming a left L-stance toward A, at the same time executing a high guarding block to A with a knife hand.
curPatternObj.40: Step 39. Bring the right foot to the left foot, and then move the left foot to B forming a right L-stance toward B, at the same time executing a high guarding block to B with a knife hand.
curPatternObj.41: End: Bring the foot back to a ready position
curPatternObj.title: Ko-DangEdit
